title: Inside Kim Kardashian’s extravagant 39th birthday dinner
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Kim Kardashian turns 39 on Monday so what better way to bring in another year of Kim by gathering her nearest and dearest on Saturday night for a party?

The mogul gave fans a sneak peek into her celebrations last night with a glimpse at her pre-party makeup, the extravagantly-decorated dinner and the after-party fun.

Shall we?

It all kicked off on Kim’s stories as she let us know little sister Kylie Jenner was doing her makeup. Sort of makes sense, seeing as the 22-year-old is a billionaire cosmetics entrepreneur and knows a thing or two about contouring.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The two were getting ready in the bathroom of Kris Jenner’s holiday home, where the family had gathered to ring in another spin around the year for Kim.

Kylie did Kim’s make-up (Picture: Kim Kardashian / Instagram)

The table decorations were something else (Picture: Instagram/kimkardashian)

It IS all about you, Kimberly (Picture: Kim Kardashian / Instagram)

Unfortunately Kris wasn’t at the party (due to being at Jennifer Lawrence’s wedding), held at her sprawling seven-bedroom home in La Quinta, near Palm Springs, but that didn’t stop her kids from taking over the abode.

Appropriately dubbed ‘Kim day’, Kim then showed us the table adorned with a whole heap of party accoutrements to make it special for those toasting.

From party hats to sunglasses, necklaces and confetti, it was the birthday of dreams.

Kim is the birthday babe (Picture: Kim Kardashian / Instagram)

Pink and peach was the theme (Picture: Kim Kardashian / Instagram)

There was no mistaking whose birthday it was (Picture: Kim Kardashian / Instagram)

Showing everyone who the real megastar was, Kim’s party hat read ‘birthday princess’ and rightly so, taking pride of place next to a necklace that sported ‘birthday babe’ and a broach that let everyone know ‘today is all about you’.

Alright, Kim, we get it – today is your day.

Numerous peach balloons sat in bundles on the table with pink streamers fitting in the colour theme of the evening.

Afterwards it seemed the family gathered together for a good, old-fashioned board game night – with a twist.

Advertisement

Advertisement

While we can only wish to have been a fly on the wall, Kim revealed her partygoers took in a game of Cards Against Humanity – a rather naughty time-passer.

Happy birthday to Kim (Picture: Getty Images)

Kim’s husband Kanye West and their four children, North, Saint, Chicago and Psalm weren’t to be seen in the nighttime snaps, but they were never far from her thoughts over the weekend after the reality star shared a pretty cute snap of her husband sleeping on Friday.

It followed a pretty important trip for Kim when she got baptised along with three of the kids in a traditional ceremony in Armenia. North was baptised in Jerusalem in 2015.

What a week for Kim, eh?

Happy birthday!

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Inside Kim Kardashian’s 39th birthday with party hats and naughty Cards Against Humanity.
